    • Method Detail

      • move

        public static boolean move(Movable movable,
           Point to,
           Level level)
        Moves given movable to given point in level. Checks bounds, collisions, and possible box moves.
        Parameters:
        movable - movable to move
        to - desired point to be moved to
        level - level to move in
        Returns:
        true if valid move
